nodes.text: A Ng'rhr, in the Wookiee culture, was a Wookiee who was the master of an apprentice in a given trade. The word "Ng'rhr" meant "clan uncle" in Shyriiwook.
In 0 ABY, the Wookiee bounty hunter Chenlambec acted as the Ng'rhr to Tinian I'att. She often referred to him as such both as a sign of respect and affection.
